[[# Main index template. ****WARNING: THIS IS THE TESTDATA TEMPLATE, NOT THE PRODUCTION ONE !!**** Expected parameters: - title: string, Web page title - entries: list(string), generated HTML for each entry. No assumption is done on the actual data for an entry. It could be the entry itself, some SHTML entity or just about any textual thing. TODO: - layout: header, footer, associated links Relevant links: - shtml: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/1.3/howto/ssi.html ]] [[title]] [[for entry in entries]] [[entry]] [[end]]
